mapper.select: select ml.member_level_no,ml.member_level_name,count(m.member_level_no) as member_level_count from member_level ml left join member m on m.member_level_no = ml.member_level_no group by ml.member_level_no,ml.member_level_name
mapper.delete: delete from member_level where member_level_no not in ( select member_level_no from member where member_level_no = #{member_level_no}) and member_level_no = #{member_level_no}
